Translations.Text: Gore tem, kotoryye obveshivayut [drugikh]
a [sami] berut spolna, kogda lyudi otmerivayut im
[Gore tem, kotoryye], kogda sami obmerivayut ili obveshivayut, to prichinyayut ubytok [drugim]
Neuzheli oni ne dumayut o tom, chto ikh voskresyat
v velikiy den'
v tot den', kogda lyudi predstanut pered Gospodom [obitateley] mirov
Net zhe! Voistinu, kniga [deyaniy] nechestivtsev, konechno, nakhoditsya v siddzhine
Otkuda tebe znat', chto takoye siddzhin
Eto - kniga zapisey [greshnikov]
Gore v tot den' tem, kto ne priznayet
kto otritsayet Sudnyy den'
I tol'ko prestupnyy greshnik posmeyet otritsat' yego
Kogda yemu vozveshchayut Nashi znameniya, on vosklitsayet: "Pobasenki drevnikh narodov
Tak net zhe! Deyaniya ikh okutali [pelenoy] ikh serdtsa
Voistinu, v tot den' ikh ne dopustyat k Gospodu
a potom nepremenno otpravyat ikh v adskiy ogon'
Nakonets, im skazhut: "Eto to, chto vy otritsali
Voistinu, kniga pravednikov [v tot den'] budet v 'illiyyune
Otkuda tebe znat', chto takoye 'illiyyun
Eto - kniga zapisey [pravednikov]
kotoruyu oberegayut priblizhennyye Allakha
Voistinu, pravedniki budut blagodenstvovat'
na lozhakh, sozertsaya [rayskiye sady]
Na ikh litsakh ty uvidish' primety blagodenstviya
Ikh budut poit' vyderzhannym vinom
zapechatannym muskusom. Pust' zhazhdushchiye zhazhdut yego
ono smeshano s [vodoy] tasnima
istochnika, iz kotorogo p'yut priblizhennyye [k Allakhu]
Voistinu, greshniki (t. ye. mekkanskiye mnogobozhniki) nasmekhalis' nad temi, kto uveroval
Kogda prokhodili mimo nikh, to peremigivalis', [izdevayas']
Kogda zhe vozvrashchalis' k svoim sem'yam, to zloradstvovali [nad osmeyannymi veruyushchimi]
Kogda oni videli veruyushchikh, to vosklitsali: "Konechno, oni - zabludshiye
No ved' oni ne byli pristavleny k nim strazhami
A v tot den' (t. ye. v Sudnyy den') te, kotoryye uverovali, budut nasmekhat'sya nad nevernymi
[vozlezha] na lozhakh i zhelaya udostoverit'sya
chto nevernym vozdali za ikh deyaniya
